meanings.definition: Choose to take or not take a particular course of action.
meanings.sent1: She was opting to stay home instead of going out with her friends.
meanings.sent2: He is opting to study for the test rather than watch TV.
meanings.sent3: By opting to skip dessert, she saved room for the delicious main course.
meanings.sent4: Opting for the scenic route, they enjoyed a leisurely drive through the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The team captain's decision to opt for a risky play paid off in the end.

meanings.definition: To make a choice from a range of possibilities.
meanings.sent1: They are opting for the blue paint for the walls.
meanings.sent2: She is opting for the salad instead of the sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent3: Opting between two ice cream flavors was a tough decision for the kids.
meanings.sent4: He kept opting for the same brand of shoes because they were comfortable.
meanings.sent5: The couple was opting for a beach vacation over a mountain retreat this year.
